thread.title: Queen Elizabeth pusheS the Londonm marathon starting button

title: Queen Elizabeth pusheS the Londonm marathon starting button
text:
Queen Elizabeth pusheS the Londonm marathon starting button Sunday, April 22, 2018 - 00:31 
Britain's Queen Elizabeth remotely started the London Marathon on Sunday (April 22), via the push of a button in the grounds of Windsor Castle. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Britain's Queen Elizabeth remotely started the London Marathon on Sunday (April 22), via the push of a button in the grounds of Windsor Castle. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2qUW1bo
